scripts.watch: concurrently --prefix "[{time}]" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "cd extension && npm run watch:content" "cd extension && npm run watch:background" "cd popup && npm run watch"
scripts.build: concurrently --prefix "[{time}]" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd extension && npm run build" "cd popup && npm run build"
scripts.build:dev: concurrently --prefix "[{time}]" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd extension && npm run build:dev" "cd popup && npm run build"
